review: Chromecast will not play all your local files. It is primarily used for netlix, google play, and similar sources that you have to pay for.It will not play mkv or avi files. There is no software that chromecast works with to play local files. You have to try every move though the chrome browser, which most of the time will re-download your files. Its very complicated and a big let down.For those of you thinking it will pay anything on your desktop it does not.It is incompatible with just about every move viewer most of us use. Doesnt work with Quicktime, Windows player, etc. It says it does work with RealPlayer, but the kicker here is you have to upload your files to the RealPlayer cloud then down load them from Chrome to watch them online, not local. This is the most backwards device and a big let down.
author: Travis White "Travis"

Horrible experience all around, very disappointed with google and that amazon would even stock such a product.
